attires.name: Henna (Mehndi) - Traditional
attires.description: Traditional henna designs applied to the palms, featuring floral and paisley patterns, common in weddings and festivals.

attires.name: Henna (Mehndi) - Arabic Style
attires.description: Henna designs with bold, flowing lines and less intricate filling, popular in North India and among younger women.

attires.name: Henna (Mehndi) - Rajasthani Style
attires.description: Highly intricate henna designs covering the entire palm and often extending to the arms, popular in Rajasthan.
